name: 郭謦維
objective:
本課程目的旨在培養並增進學生的基本漢語能力，使學生能夠應付日常生活的基本需要。

本課程分為上學期2學分，下學期2學分。上學期透過基本發音教學、漢字教學等入門課程打好基礎後，下學期則著重語法教學。

This course aims to build up learners' ability in basic Chinese so as to prepare them with the language tools to survive daily tasks in Taiwan. 

This course gives 2 credits for the fall semester and 2 for the spring semester. In the fall term, prelimaries such as pronunciation and Chinese characters are stressed while grammar is the main point for the spring term.
